LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Title: Active Protocols
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Tip: Press Left Ctrl to show details.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Hide.Tip: Press any key to hide details.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Foundation.Label: 「FOUNDATION」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Foundation.Description: Higher dimensional nanites will proliferate within this entity's body in an entropy-decreasing pattern.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Ascension.Label: 「ASCENSION」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Ascension.Description: Higher dimensional nanites will fundamentally alter this entity's physiology, granting perpetual corporeal existence.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.NooNet.Label: 「NOONET」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.NooNet.Description: Higher dimensional nanites augment neural functions, shield consciousness integrity, and construct virtual domains for cognitive refinement.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Weave.Label: 「WEAVE」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Weave.Description: Higher dimensional nanites enable fundamental particle manipulation akin to weaving primal clay.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Contravention.Label: 「CONTRAVENTION」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Contravention.Description: Higher dimensional nanites will distort reality's laws to intercept conventional assaults.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Phoenix.Label: 「PHOENIX」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Phoenix.Description: Higher dimensional nanites perpetually regenerate biological systems. Catastrophic damage triggers radical protection protocols.
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Anchor.Label: 「ANCHOR」
LanguageData.FOU.Protocols.Anchor.Description: Higher-dimensional nanites will "anchor" this entity's ontological existence. Upon obtaining authorization from <color=#D09B61>「████」</color>, they can reconstitute the physical form at any coordinates.
